data.message: I'm am a huge fan but I never realized how liberal and soft Eminem really is. You have said and done worse so don't be a hypocrite. I bet you would have loved Hillary as president. All of a sudden I see your past in a different light 😂. Purely an illusion and deep down you are truly soft. Man, I guess slim shady  really is dead!!

replies.message: So everybody who disses Trump is now liberal? What a stupid thing to say. And by the way, Eminem already has dissed Hillary Clinton and Bill Clinton serval times. So because Eminem doesn't dickride Trump like most of his supporters he is liberal? Eminem disses whoever he wants, politicians or other famous people.
Jealousy. Trump did the same thing Em did, but actually became president. Haters be hatin'.
Christie Askew he's soft like a roll of Charmin toilet paper.
Eminem forgets that he spent most of his career spitting vile hateful anti gay rhetoric.
Jealous at what? I'm surely not jealous.
